name: pong blaster
description:
It is a combination of a tennis / pong game and a top down shooter.
The paddle goes to the mouse and when you click you shoot a bullet.
You get an extra life if you shoot the ball in the AI's goal and you lose one if you hit a bullet from the AI. The same goes for the AI.
If you are won or lost the game will start automatically after 5 seconds.

I hope it is fun even though it still has minor bugs (;
